archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Git Website
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: The website provides download links for Git on macOS, Windows, and Linux/Unix. It also has a section for older releases and the Git source repository on GitHub. Additionally, it lists the latest source release, mentions built-in GUI tools and third-party GUI clients, provides Git logos for use, and explains how to obtain the latest development version of Git via Git itself​1​.
